Package com.tiyb.tev

Class TevApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiyb.tev.TevApplication
  • @SpringBootApplication
@EnableAutoConfiguration(exclude=org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.jdbc.DataSourceAutoConfiguration.class)
public class TevApplication
extends java.lang.Object

    This is the main class for the Tumblr Export Viewer (TEV) application. As the name implies, the intent is to be able to read in Tumblr export files and provide a UI for viewing posts and conversations from that export. As an extra feature, the application will allow posts to be marked as "read" as well as marked as "favourites," for use cases where the user wants to read through a blog and keep track of what has been read and what hasn't.

    There are two main components to the application:

    1. The RESTful API, exposing all of the data that has been imported (controlled by TEVPostRestController, TEVConvoRestController, and TEVMetadataRestController)
    2. The jQuery-based HTML interface (controlled by TEVUIController})

    The application leverages an HSQLDB database for storage. By default, Spring Boot leverages HSQLDB in an in-memory format (and doesn't allow this to be overridden, even when the appropriate properties are set in application.properties, but TEV needs it to be persisted. For this reason, the application is configured to ignore auto-configuration for DataSourceAutoConfiguration, and instead supplies the data source in a hard-coded fashion.

    Author:
    tiyb

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main function for starting the application, called by Spring Boot at boot-up. No custom implementation, the standard implementation for Spring Boot is used.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments, if any. (TEV doesn't expect/use any.)

      • primaryDataSource

        @Bean
public javax.sql.DataSource primaryDataSource()
        Returns the DataSource bean for working with the database. This is the only way the HSQL data source can be forced to use a file-based database, instead of in-memory.
        Returns:
        Standard Java DataSource

      • jdbcTemplate

        @Bean
public org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate​(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
        Used for custom DB scripts that need to be executed by admin tools
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The DS used by the application
        Returns:
        a JdbcTemplate for this application/data source
